cards.title: Prince Siddhartha / Bodhicitta
cards.concept: Renunciation and first noble unease; leaving the palace to seek truth
cards.visual: young prince stepping beyond palace gate with begging bowl, dog at heel, stepping into unknown

cards.title: Padmasambhava / Upaya
cards.concept: Skillful means; using any tool to awaken beings
cards.visual: tantric master with ritual implements, mudra and mantra, elements swirling

cards.title: Prajnaparamita / Sunyata
cards.concept: Mother of Buddhas; emptiness of all phenomena
cards.visual: robed figure behind a veil with Heart Sutra scroll, void halo

cards.title: Green Tara / Karuna
cards.concept: Active compassion; one foot ready to move toward suffering
cards.visual: green deity on lotus, one leg extended, hand in blessing, lush fertile surround

cards.title: Chakravartin / Shila
cards.concept: Wheel-turning monarch; ethical discipline and protection
cards.visual: sovereign on Dharma wheel throne, regal yet restrained, holding precept staff

cards.title: Shakyamuni Teaching / Dharma
cards.concept: First Sermon; transmission of lineage
cards.visual: Buddha in Deer Park, dharmachakra mudra, deer near a turning wheel

cards.title: Yab-Yum / Prajna & Upaya
cards.concept: Tantric union of wisdom and method; non-duality
cards.visual: paired figures in serene embrace, moon-sun halo, union of feminine/masculine energies

cards.title: Mahayana / Virya
cards.concept: Great Vehicle; energy to carry all beings
cards.visual: bodhisattva chariot/boat bearing many beings, banner of vows, purposeful motion

cards.title: Taming the Elephant / Kshanti
cards.concept: Patience and gentle control of the wild mind
cards.visual: monk guiding elephant and monkey along a path, calm gaze, soft reins

cards.title: Forest Monk / Pratyekabuddha
cards.concept: Solitary realization through meditation
cards.visual: hermit in cave with lantern and alms bowl, night sky, inner light

cards.title: Bhavachakra / Samsara
cards.concept: Wheel of Life turning under ignorance
cards.visual: wheel of six realms held by Yama, three poisons at center, twelve links around

cards.title: Yama / Karma
cards.concept: Mirror of cause and effect; impartial justice
cards.visual: lord of death with mirror and scales, sword of discernment

cards.title: Bodhisattva Vow / Reversal of View
cards.concept: Voluntary suspension; seeing dependent origination
cards.visual: figure inverted, serene, haloed, rope chosen not forced

cards.title: Maranasati / Anicca
cards.concept: Corpse meditation; impermanence of aggregates
cards.visual: cemetery contemplation, dissolving body, river of time

cards.title: Middle Way / Madhyamaka
cards.concept: Balance of extremes; tuning effort and ease
cards.visual: water poured between cups, sitar string neither too tight nor too loose

cards.title: Mara / Tanha & Upadana
cards.concept: Craving and clinging as the true chains

cards.title: Amitabha / Pure Land
cards.concept: Hope and refuge; conditions optimized for practice
cards.visual: red Buddha over lotus lake, stars reflected, gentle blessing

cards.concept: Illusion and misperception; psychic ripples
cards.visual: moon reflected in rippling pond, dogs howling, misty path

cards.title: Vairocana / Luminous Mind
cards.concept: Primordial sun; clear light always present
cards.visual: radiant sun Buddha, childlike openness, banners in warm light
